name: BERMUDA TRIANGLE
description:
Pilot a huge ZIG aircraft, and command up to three SYD escort fighters as you battle against unidentified enemies through space-time warps, traveling further and further back into the past in this revolutionary shooter released by SNK in 1987.

* 2P gameplay / ad-hoc functionality is not available for this software
